700572f-a.text:
Broadway, west side, between West 251st and 252nd Streets, showing greenhouses in the background, directly off the east side of Post Road.
July 18, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.

700371f-a.text:
West 251st Street, north side, between Broadway and Post Road. The houses, the rears of which are seen, are situated on Post Road, at, adioining and north of the N.E. corner of West 25lst Street. The small driveway, on which automobiles are parked is the old Albany Post Road, at this
date (1937) nonwexistent.
July 18, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
